ud3.5:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud3.5:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma mahamoggallano bhagavato avidure nisinno hoti pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya kayagataya satiya ajjhattam supatthitaya.
ud3.5:1.4: Addasa kho bhagava ayasmantam mahamoggallanam avidure nisinnam pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya kayagataya satiya ajjhattam supatthitaya.
ud3.5:2.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
